Dr. Toast Live @ The Ultimate Dance Experience

posted February 20, 2012 | music, shows

Friday, March 23, 2012 8:30pm-1:00am - Featuring Dr. Toast, The Polish Ambassador (new track out on False Profit Records), and Sharu.

From masstransitdance.com: “Do you ever wish you could hear amazing music and have room to actually dance? Born from a frustration with the ‘standard’ music scene, Mass Transit Dance created ‘The Ultimate Dance Experience’, bringing you the best Producers and DJs in a space where you have room to DANCE in an alcohol-free, barefoot dance space with other conscious movers. To ensure ample room for moving, ticket sales are limited to 300 in the 12,000 square foot Historic Sweet’s Ballroom in Oakland. Complimentary sacred tea service will be provided by Om Shan Tea.” [info, facebook, tickets]

Dr. Toast Live @ Ganucheau's "Elements" Release Party

posted February 20, 2012 | music, shows

Saturday, February 25, 2012, 10pm-2am - My good friend and musical collaborator Ganucheau is releasing his beautiful, long-anticipated album ”Elements” on False Profit Records, and I have the honor of performing at the album release party. Also playing are Ganucheau (of course), Evolutionista and Palindrome. $5 cover, or $10 including a code for digital download. Underground location will be announced on the day of the event. [info, facebook]

Dr. Toast Live @ Lucidity Festival

posted February 19, 2012 | music, shows

April 13-15, 2012 - Join Dr. Toast at this three-day music and art festival at Live Oak Camp in Santa Barbara, CA. Six themed villages, art installations, live performances. Random Rab, Phutureprimative, Love and Light, Russ Liquid, Heyoka, Gladkill, Birds of Paradise, Karim So, and many more! [info, facebook, tickets]

Dr. Toast Live @ Transported SF

posted February 18, 2012 | music, shows

Thursday, February 23, 2012, 8pm-11:30pm - Dr. Toast and F’kir team up again for a chill bus excursion to destinations unknown! Join 40 other friendly folks on a biodiesel bus with a soundsystem as we travel throughout the bay area to surprise outdoor locations, where we unload, dance, then climb back aboard and head to our next spot. It’s $23 and BYOB, and pickup is at Million Fishes gallery at 2501 Bryant St. [info, facebook, tickets]

Dr. Toast Live @ SF MOMA

posted October 4, 2011 | music, shows

Saturday, October 8, 2011, 8:30am - Dr. Toast performs at the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art during a free yoga class taught by Les Leventhal and Giselle Mari, with free museum admission! Brought to you by Naked and Flavorpill.  RSVP here!

Dr. Toast Live @ Burning Man 2011

posted August 24, 2011 | music, shows

Hi folks, here's my Burning Man schedule!

Tuesday evening, 5:30-6:45pm - Playa Yoga + Get Your Dance On w/ Marques Wyatt, Dr Toast + Elena Brower (Open Playa, near the Temple): "Robot Heart provides the biggest sound on the playa as Anusara Yoga legend Elena Brower rocks your body to the sweet beats of Dr Toast. Then Marques Wyatt takes over the decks as the sun sets for 90 minutes of dance madness. Quick n dirty. Come get down." [facebook event]

Wednesday morning, 6am - False Profit Tuesday Party (The Institute, 3:30 and Esplanade) - featuring Broxtronix ::: Dr. Toast ::: ill.Gates ::: Kid Kameleon ::: Lokae ::: Love and Light ::: MiM0SA ::: More Champagne (Gladkill & ChrisB) ::: Obi-J ::: R/D ::: saQi ::: Tinker [facebook event, false-profit.com, photo credit]

Thursday night, 9pm - Coming of Phage (The Institute, 3:30 and Esplanade) - The lineup features a full slate of home team DJs from the village plus two special guests: Matt Black from the UK (of Coldcut & Ninja-tune fame); and Kaminanda, purveyor of very nice, very deep mid tempo sounds; and another Vancouver native (just like our own dear Sharps!). [facebook event]

Friday afternoon, 2pm-5pm - Janky Color Day (on the Janky Barge art car, departing from 3:30 and Esplanade). Join us for the 2nd annual FP / JB color day collaboration. Wear the monochromatic outfit of your choice! Dr. Toast, OBI-J, and Janky DJs TBA [facebook event]

Dr. Toast Live @ Plunge

posted August 15, 2011 | music, shows

September 9 – 11, 2011 at Camp & Sons - Come spend the weekend with the Dr. under the stars at this beautiful 400-acre mountain retreat and organic garden in Mendocino County. Three days and nights of camping, dancing, and wood-fired hot-tubbing as you enjoy the great lineup of Ambient/Downtempo/Experimental/Chill-Out/Eclectic artists. [location, info/tickets]

Dr. Toast Live @ California Academy of Sciences

posted August 10, 2011 | music, shows

Thursday, September 15, 2011, 6-10pm - Dr. Toast is pleased to again be invited to perform in front of the coral reef in the aquarium at the California Academy of Sciences in Golden Gate Park, San Francisco. He will be accompanied by the beautiful sounds of Evolutionista and Ganucheau.  Mark your calendar! [info]



 

Dr. Toast Live @ The Toast Expo

posted July 12, 2011 | music, shows

Saturday, July 16, 12:00pm - 3:00pm, 221 11th St, San Francisco (@ Howard)

From the Facebook event:

Toast Expo is the second installment in a not-so-serious annual festival concerning food+drink as a creativity medium.

live music sets

Dr. Toast
Fellow toast enthusiast and musician on False Profit Records. His latest release 'Gravity is Quiet' just came out last week.

alphazed
Post-global electronic composer/violinist.

Dr. Toast Live @ Equity

posted July 12, 2011 | music, shows

Wednesday, July 13, 5:30p to 9:00p - Join Dr. Toast and Watsonix at the False Profit happy hour for songs from his new album, abundant pizza, $2 Red Stripes, and all sorts of post-Priceless merriment. Il Pirata (2007 16th at Potrero) [map]
